dict.string: color: #fff; font-size: 1em; padding: 0 3px; font-weight: 100; -webkit-transform: rotate(30deg); text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #000, -1px -1px 0px #000, -1px 1px 0px #000, 1px -1px 0px #000, 0px -1px 0px #000, 0px 1px 0px #000, 1px 0px 0px #000, -1px 0px 0px #000; font-family: AvenirNextCondensed-Regular;
